title: Drawing, "Landscape in Texas with House and Trees", February 26, 1890
medium: Graphite, on paper with curved right corners.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top left: Texas Feb. 26th - 90.; at bottom right: Lovely effects - the contrast / of streaks and small masses / of rich yellowish green grass / with brown and reddish dry grass; and again at bottom left: [a]nd grey earth.
description: Horizontal distant view of trees and a house across flat land

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape in Texas with House and Trees", February 26, 1890.
February 26, 1890. Graphite, on paper with curved right corners.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-73.
